verses.text: \w Then|strong="G2532"\w* \w I|strong="G2532"\w* heard \w a|strong="G2532"\w* \w loud|strong="G3173"\w* \w voice|strong="G5456"\w*, \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w came|strong="G2532"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Temple|strong="G3485"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w seven|strong="G2033"\w* angels – “\w Go|strong="G5217"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* empty \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w seven|strong="G2033"\w* \w bowls|strong="G5357"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w wrath|strong="G2372"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w on|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w earth|strong="G1093"\w*.”

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w I|strong="G2532"\w* heard \w the|strong="G2532"\w* angel \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Waters|strong="G5204"\w* \w saying|strong="G3004"\w* – “\w Righteous|strong="G1342"\w* \w are|strong="G1510"\w* \w you|strong="G3754"\w*, \w you|strong="G3754"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w*, \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Holy|strong="G3741"\w* \w One|strong="G3588"\w*, \w in|strong="G2532"\w* inflicting \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w judgment|strong="G2919"\w*;

\w for|strong="G3754"\w* men \w shed|strong="G1632"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* blood \w of|strong="G2532"\w* Christ’s \w people|strong="G1510"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w prophets|strong="G4396"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w you|strong="G3754"\w* \w have|strong="G2532"\w* \w given|strong="G1325"\w* \w them|strong="G1325"\w* blood \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w drink|strong="G4095"\w*. \w It|strong="G2532"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w what|strong="G2532"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* deserve.”

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w I|strong="G2532"\w* heard \w the|strong="G2532"\w* response \w from|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w altar|strong="G2379"\w* – “\w Yes|strong="G3483"\w*, \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, \w our|strong="G2316"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Almighty|strong="G3841"\w*, \w true|strong="G3588"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w righteous|strong="G1342"\w* \w are|strong="G3588"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w judgments|strong="G2920"\w*.”

\w Then|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w fourth|strong="G5067"\w* \w angel|strong="G1632"\w* emptied \w his|strong="G1909"\w* \w bowl|strong="G5357"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w sun|strong="G2246"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w was|strong="G3588"\w* \w permitted|strong="G1325"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w scorch|strong="G2739"\w* \w men|strong="G3588"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w fire|strong="G4442"\w*;

\w Then|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w fifth|strong="G3991"\w* \w angel|strong="G1632"\w* emptied \w his|strong="G1909"\w* \w bowl|strong="G5357"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w throne|strong="G2362"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Beast|strong="G2342"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w darkness|strong="G4656"\w* \w fell|strong="G1096"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* \w its|strong="G1537"\w* kingdom. \w Men|strong="G3588"\w* \w gnawed|strong="G3145"\w* \w their|strong="G2532"\w* \w tongues|strong="G1100"\w* \w for|strong="G1909"\w* \w pain|strong="G4192"\w*,

\w Then|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w sixth|strong="G1623"\w* \w angel|strong="G1632"\w* emptied \w his|strong="G1909"\w* \w bowl|strong="G5357"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w great|strong="G3173"\w* \w river|strong="G4215"\w* \w Euphrates|strong="G2166"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w water|strong="G5204"\w* \w in|strong="G1909"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w river|strong="G4215"\w* \w was|strong="G3588"\w* \w dried|strong="G3583"\w* \w up|strong="G3583"\w*, \w so|strong="G2443"\w* \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w road|strong="G3598"\w* \w for|strong="G1909"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w kings|strong="G3588"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* East \w might|strong="G2532"\w* \w be|strong="G2532"\w* \w made|strong="G2090"\w* \w ready|strong="G2090"\w*.

\wj (“\+w I|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w am|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w coming|strong="G2064"\+w* \+w like|strong="G5613"\+w* \+w a|strong="G5613"\+w* \+w thief|strong="G2812"\+w*! \+w Happy|strong="G3107"\+w* \+w will|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w he|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w be|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w who|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w is|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w on|strong="G2440"\+w* \+w the|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w watch|strong="G1127"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w keeps|strong="G5083"\+w* \+w his|strong="G3708"\+w* \+w clothing|strong="G2440"\+w* \+w at|strong="G3588"\+w* hand, \+w so|strong="G2443"\+w* \+w that|strong="G2443"\+w* \+w he|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w will|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3361"\+w* \+w have|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w to|strong="G2443"\+w* \+w walk|strong="G4043"\+w* \+w about|strong="G5613"\+w* unclothed \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w let|strong="G2443"\+w* \+w men|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w see|strong="G3708"\+w* \+w his|strong="G3708"\+w* nakedness.”)\wj*

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* spirits collected \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w kings|strong="G3588"\w* \w at|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w place|strong="G5117"\w* \w called|strong="G2564"\w* \w in|strong="G1519"\w* \w Hebrew|strong="G1447"\w* “Har-Magedon.”

(\w A|strong="G1096"\w* \w loud|strong="G3173"\w* \w voice|strong="G5456"\w* \w came|strong="G1096"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w throne|strong="G2362"\w* \w in|strong="G1909"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Temple|strong="G3485"\w*; \w it|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* “\w All|strong="G2532"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w over|strong="G1909"\w*.”)

\w There|strong="G2532"\w* \w followed|strong="G1096"\w* flashes \w of|strong="G2532"\w* lightning, cries, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w peals|strong="G1027"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w thunder|strong="G1027"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w there|strong="G2532"\w* \w was|strong="G1096"\w* \w a|strong="G1096"\w* \w great|strong="G3173"\w* \w earthquake|strong="G4578"\w*, \w such|strong="G3779"\w* \w as|strong="G2532"\w* \w had|strong="G2532"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w occurred|strong="G1096"\w* \w since|strong="G1096"\w* \w man|strong="G3739"\w* \w began|strong="G1096"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w be|strong="G1096"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w earth|strong="G1093"\w* – \w none|strong="G3756"\w* \w so|strong="G3779"\w* \w great|strong="G3173"\w*;

\w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w every|strong="G3956"\w* \w island|strong="G3520"\w* vanished, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w mountains|strong="G3735"\w* disappeared.

\w Great|strong="G3173"\w* \w hailstones|strong="G5464"\w*, \w a|strong="G5613"\w* pound \w in|strong="G1909"\w* weight, \w are|strong="G1510"\w* \w falling|strong="G2597"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* \w men|strong="G3588"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w heavens|strong="G3772"\w*. \w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w men|strong="G3588"\w* blasphemed \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w because|strong="G3754"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* curse \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w hail|strong="G5464"\w*, \w for|strong="G3754"\w* \w it|strong="G2532"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w* \w a|strong="G5613"\w* \w very|strong="G2532"\w* \w terrible|strong="G3173"\w* curse.
